name: Loopey (ShadowBrain)
description:
This "game" was made for Ludum Dare 47 within 72 hours.

The theme was "Stuck in a loop"

This is a bit of a weird one folks.

I had no ideas for the theme, so I just made some VR toys.

Grab stuff with grip, index controllers can squeeze some things, this is set to trigger on other controllers.
